reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater cute with pretty fall colors and appreciate its wonderful quality, comfort, and softness.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Too cute!
items.body: I was very pleasantly surprised at how perfect this item is! It’s so extremely cute and soft and seems to be a decent quality at least for regular wear, I’m sure with heavy wear and heavy washing it might pill a bit just because it is a knitted item, but for my purposes it is fine. I purchased it to wear with my Renaissance Faire costume on chilly days and it’s great! Slightly cropped (probably about belly button length on my 5’2” small busted frame) so it doesn’t cover up or get tangled up with my belt. Surprisingly warm even though it is knitted. The embroidery looks amazing and is so well done with beautiful vibrant autumn tones. The xs was my perfect, still roomy but without looking sloppy. Sleeves are that perfect length if being long enough that I could pull it slightly over my hand but the cuffs allow them to stay pushed up and I love the slight balloon sleeve look because they aren’t too big, just perfect! I hesitated forever to purchase because there was no picture reviews but I wish I had bought it sooner because it’s just so perfect and cute! I HIGHLY RECOMMEND this item! Read more
items.author: Alena Cooper

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful sweater
items.body: Wonderful quality, very cute and lots of color choices. Sadly had to return because my daughter wants a different color and for it to be a little baggier, but we’re getting another one in a different color and size. Sizing is otherwise spot on. Read more
items.author: Akeda

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not burgandy. True to size. Still pretty fall colors.
items.body: True to size. I typically wear 16-18 and the XXL fit correctly. Fabric is medium weight, not a chunky sweater, but definitely thicker than a light cardigan. Great fall colors and stitching seems to be good quality. I would give 5 stars, but the color is not at all the burgandy I ordered. It is a dark orange. Read more
items.author: Stefanie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stylish & Cropped
items.body: Such a cute sweater! Its a little but more cropped in length than I expected but I wore a cami underneath! But otherwise true to size! Read more
items.author: Ilanae

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect cardigan sweater!
items.body: I absolutely love this sweater. I also bought it in the cream. It’s a little bit of a shorter cut but went great with a dress and with a little bit higher waisted jeans. I received lots of compliments. Cute and comfortable. Read more
items.author: Beth Smart

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute and soft but maybe not great quality
items.body: Incredibly soft and cute. Had MAJOR pilling after wearing it for a 7 hour work day. Huge bummer. Read more
items.author: Sara

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable
items.body: Comfortable and so cute! Read more
items.author: Eire Brower

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Cottagecore Cropped Sweater
items.body: Such a big fan!! I was looking for a cozy cropped sweater and this was the only one that I could find that felt like what I wanted and I'm really happy with it!! I am probably going to buy one or two more colors just to fit my wardrobe. They're perfect for the skirts and dresses I enjoy wearing. Read more
items.author: Tim Ang

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
about_this_item:

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Mint Green, Khaki, Pale Yellow, Pink, White, Purple, Burgundy, Light Army Green, Apricot, Army Green, Black, Coffee Brown. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
